title: The Namarielle
description: Cassai has always longed for adventure, but when the murderous Fontre arrive from the Inner Kingdom seeking her and her love, Elian, she’ll long for her sheepfold once again. Thrown into the treacherous Forest of Fondair, separated from Elian, Cassai’s goal is to reach the mountains and plead with the Kiatri for help wresting Lashai from the clutches of the High King, Ffastian. Luckily, her path crosses Hollis, a Kiatri willing to lead her to the mountains. Elian will fight off werewolves, Fontre, and even his own brother in an attempt to get back to Cassai and keep her safe. Will Cassai survive the forest? Will Elian reach her before those seeking her life catch up with her? Is Hollis as safe as he seems? Find out in The Namarielle the first installment of The Namarielle Trilogy.
author: Julien Jamar
